item.title: Galapagos Islands Travel Guide (Ecuador/South America)
item.description: Plan your dream trip to the Galapagos Islands with this comprehensive travel guide that covers everything from places to visit, hiking and biking routes, best things to do, where to stay, local cuisine, culture, safety and health, and much more. Start exploring the natural wonders of the Galapagos Islands.
